title: Availability
description: An object describing the availability of nodes in a subtree.

bufferView.description: Index of a buffer view that indicates whether each node of the subtree is available. The bitstream is a 1D boolean array that has an element for each node. If a node is available, its bit is 1, and if it is unavailable, the bit is 0. The number of elements in the array is (N ^ (subtreeDepth + 1) - 1) / (N - 1)

constant.description: Integer indicating whether all of the nodes are available (1) or all the nodes are unavailable (0).
